name: ​Ripple漾
description: Ripple漾 As is vividly descripted in the game, a small lovely water-drop fell on the surface of a pieceful lake.There are floating wrinks around you.Go flow with the waves,and faded at the edge of the world.Winds smoothly touch your face,the lake lying like a beautiful girl. It's your object to comtrol the little triangle go across the gap on surrounding circles.The lines rotate around at a accelerate rate,and your job is to sketrech the extrimely right moment and get to the next circle.Between you and the success are 5 floors.Remember,don't stand still for a long time.You will disappear and the game will restart. Playcontrol: Begin: Space Key Jump: Space Key
